attributes.action: Stop The nonsense of the New Years honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop all this tomfoolery of New Years Honours,unless it goes to people who give all for little or no reward. Not to people if it wasn't for the money we would never hear about them.It is complete and utter nonsense.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
